page.title: 10FARMING IN THE SESSAY FIELDS
page.content: {Modern farms}rely on machines. The advent of the{tractor}and attachments has speeded up the cultivation process and reduced the number of workers. Fertilisers & weedkillers ensure the greatest crop-success rate. Modern farming can alter landscape with newer crops like Oilseed Rape.{Large fields} are more economical to work so some hedges have been removed. Continental cattle can be seen but our native Hereford is holding its own. There are also some{intensive breeding units}for pigs and poultry. In Sessay several farms still fatten beef cattle with locally-grown root crops and cereals and there is also one{traditional mixed farm.}This has a dairy herd, free-range poultry and pigs, and an arable acreage which supports the livestock during Winter. This type of farm is rare nowadays.
